apps.name: STEP File Viewer
apps.desc: STEP File Viewer is a lightweight tool built for viewing .step and .stp files across macOS, iPad, and iPhone. It’s built to work offline, ensuring your models stay accessible—no network needed.
apps.promotional: A lightweight, ad-free STEP viewer built for productivity.
features: View STEP models in 3D with rotate, pan, and zoom controls using perspective projection.
Display 3D models in solid, shaded, or wireframe modes.
Export: Save 3D models in STL, OBJ, glTF, GLB, or USDZ formats.
Export projected views of the model—including top, front, and right views—in SVG format.
Capture and save screenshots of the viewport for easy sharing.

knowledge.title: The STEP format (ISO 10303)
knowledge.content: STEP is a promise of precision wrapped in a plain text shell.  A neutral CAD format born to keep geometry honest across software borders. It carries solids, surfaces, assemblies—clean, structured, and painfully strict. No flair, no shortcuts, just geometry described the way engineers wish the world behaved.  It isn’t perfect. Files get heavy, exporters cut corners, and interpretations drift.  But when you need 3D data that survives the jump from one system to another, STEP is still the steady, quietly reliable workhorse everyone ends up trusting.

apps.name: ShareGuard
apps.desc: ShareGuard protects sensitive information in your images — including hidden metadata as well as visible faces and text — giving you full control before sharing. It lets you mask, or apply mosaic to sensitive areas precisely, so you can share images easily and confidently.
features: Auto-detect and clear sensitive Exif metadata
Protect text, and faces in image before sharing
Auto mosaic with facial and text recognition AI
Batch processing with lossless quality
Local processing — nothing leaves your device
100% Offline, no data leaves device

knowledge.title: Clear Metadata & Auto Mosaic
knowledge.content: Every digital photo carries hidden metadata known as Exif. It records not just aperture and shutter speed, but often your precise GPS coordinates. ShareGuard leverages the low-level ImageIO framework to surgically strip this invisible data without re-encoding pixels, ensuring your digital footprint remains yours alone. Whether you’re preparing screenshots, photos, or documents, ShareGuard provides flexible masking options and detailed export controls. Choose from color masks, mosaic-style masks, or smart detection modes that automatically recognize sensitive content.

apps.name: P2V Converter
apps.desc: Convert your images into vector graphics effortlessly, easily transform pixel art into scalable vector graphics in just moments.
features: Easily convert images (PNG, JPG, HEIC, and more) to vector graphics in just a few clicks
Simple, Balanced, or Detailed with colors — select the style that matches your project.
Export to SVG / PDF
All processing is done locally on your device — nothing is uploaded or stored externally
No ads, no tracking, no data collection — just a focused, efficient tool

knowledge.title: Create SVGs from your images anytime, anywhere.
knowledge.content: Raster images are made of pixels and lose quality when scaled. Vectors are made of mathematical paths and remain sharp at any size. P2V uses computer vision algorithms to trace contrast edges in your images, converting static pixels into scalable geometry instantly. Works fully offline to keep your pictures private.

apps.name: pcAI Photo Retouch
apps.desc: Want to make your old photos clear again?  Want to turn photos into sketches, oil paintings, or even Van Gogh’s Starry Night style?  AI can do it... But you don’t want to upload your photos to some unknown cloud!  pcAI lets you process images directly on your own device — with local AI, not the cloud.
features: Your photos never leave your device. No cloud AI, no hidden uploads.
No Ads. No Tracking. No Cloud.
Works without internet. On a plane, in a tunnel, anywhere. Always available.
No account, no login, no complicated settings. Just tap a button and see results immediately.

knowledge.title: All on your device, Offline and private.
knowledge.content: Most AI tools require uploading photos to a cloud server. pcAI runs entirely on your device's Neural Engine using CoreML. This means zero latency, zero privacy risk, and full functionality even when you are offline in the middle of nowhere.

apps.name: 3D Model Viewer
apps.desc: 3D Model Viewer & Converter is a lightweight, user-friendly tool for managing 3D models. Helps you convert models obtained from SAM 3D. It lets you open, view, and convert a wide range of 3D formats—anytime, anywhere, without needing an internet connection.
apps.promotional: Free to view, Easy to convert.
features: Import popular 3D formats: 3MF, STL, FBX, OBJ, GLB, USDZ, TDS, AMF, PLY, PDC, XYZ, VOX, VTK, VTP, and DXF
Export to STL, OBJ, GLB, USDZ, and GLTF
Basic editing tools: move, rotate, scale, delete, and undo changes to model objects
Batch Export Support: Selecting multiple files — even in different model formats — and converting them all to a single target format in one go
Export the model’s projected views — including top, front, and right views — in SVG format
No ads. No tracking. No data collection. Just a clean, efficient tool built for professionals.

knowledge.title: STL,DXF,3MF,OBJ,GLB,USDZ ...
knowledge.content: 3D files are essentially lists of vertices and faces. This app efficiently renders complex 3D geometries across many formats on mobile devices, bridging the gap between desktop modeling software and mobile visualization. Currently, AI (such as the SAM 3D large model) can easily generate 3D models of objects from images, but the output format may not be what you expect. This app helps you easily convert them to your desired format.

apps.name: CutoutCraft
apps.desc: AI CutoutCraft is a smart image editing tool powered entirely by on-device AI. No registration, no uploads. A few taps — remove backgrounds, restyle images, create layouts, and export instantly.
features: One-Tap AI Cutout: Remove backgrounds instantly using local CoreML models. Automatically detects the subject in any image — fast, accurate, and fully offline.
Supports multiple object images cut out from one original image.
Multi-Image Composition: Freely arrange multiple cutouts on the same canvas. Move, scale, and rotate them however you want to create your ideal composition.
Restyle Image: Choose from over 10 styles to transform your image. Apply styles to individual cutouts or the final composite.
Background Replacement: Use a transparent background, a solid color, or any image from your device — your choice.
Cutout SVG Export: Convert your image cutouts into vector SVGs.
Privacy by Design: Everything is processed locally — your images never leave your device unless you choose to share them.
No high-end hardware is required, ordinary Mac, iPhone, iPad can also run it and enjoy the convenience of AI.
No Ads. No Tracking. No Cloud: A clean, focused tool — no interruptions, no surveillance.

knowledge.title: Semantic Segmentation
knowledge.content: How does the app know what is a person and what is background? It uses a technique called Semantic Segmentation. The CoreML model analyzes the image pixel by pixel, classifying them into different categories, allowing for precise separation of the subject from its surroundings.

apps.name: DXF Assistant
apps.desc: DXF Assistant is a lightweight tool for viewing and editing DXF drawings and models, designed for macOS, iPad, and iPhone devices. It offers smooth 2D and 3D navigation, enabling easy access to your DXF files anytime, anywhere.
apps.promotional: View DXF. Convert to PDF, SVG, PNG.
features: Open and view 2D and 3D DXF files, with support for switching between standard views: top, bottom, left, right, front, back.
Merge and arrange multiple DXF files in one session; open multiple files simultaneously without losing context.
Edit drawings directly: copy, delete, move, rotate, scale, undo, redo — all supported.
Export your drawings as PDF, SVG, PNG, or JPG files with ease.
Export a combined view of multiple DXF files into a single file.
Supports table entities, allowing export of table content as CSV files.
Scan DXF file for issues before laser cutting or CNC engraving, and get a shareable PDF report.
No ads. No data collection. No tracking. Just a fast, focused productivity tool.

knowledge.title: Viewing and exploring DXF
knowledge.content: DXF (Drawing Exchange Format) is the industry standard for CAD data. Unlike raster images, DXF files contain precise mathematical vector data. This app parses these raw vectors and renders them using a custom 2D graphics engine for infinite zoom capability.

apps.name: SheetCollector
apps.desc: Easily import tables from various files and images. Keep everything organized and export anytime. Generate polished PDF or JPEG documents with your own style.
features: Import spreadsheet data from CSV, XLSX, ODS, TSV, and UTF-8 encoded JSON files.
Import table data from MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL, and SQLite3 databases.
Import table data from PNG, HEIC, JPG, BMP, TIFF, and WebP images.
Use your device’s camera to scan and import spreadsheet data.
Add, modify, or clear data by row or column.
Swap any two rows or columns instantly.
Export filtered data as CSV, PDF, or JPEG by row or column.
Customize PDF/JPEG exports with A0-A5 sizes, portrait/landscape modes, and long-page JPEG formats.
Add logos and private statements for professional documents.
Set tiered protection for the exported PDF file, separately setting a read password and an edit password.

knowledge.title: SheetCollector:xlsx ods...pdf
knowledge.content: Transforming a physical paper into a flat digital image requires complex mathematics. The app uses the Vision framework to detect the four corners of a document in real-time, then applies a homographic transformation to rectify the perspective, making the scan look like it was flatbed-scanned.
